Text: Yupon misc Cc Below is the information for opening the utility accounts in your name The phone and cable will be disconnected on Nov and the water gas and electricity will be disconnected on Nov If you make the calls prior to these dates and give them the Nov th date then the water gas and electricity will not actually be turned off in the house ElectricityReliant GasReliant WaterCity of Houston CableTime Warner PhoneSWB ATT The number for the home alarm permit is City of Houston The permits are valid for year and you must have one on record or the police will not respond The closing is on Nov th at am in the office of Commonwealth Land Title located at Kirby Suite Kirby and San Felipe I am paying Cheli to clean the house on Tuesday Nov th and her number is cell We are staying at the Sheraton Suites from Nov and my cell number is if you have any other questions I think this covers the basic items let me know if you need anything else Have a good weekend Shanna

Ball is rollingDear peoples From this point forward the S Halperins are somewhat on the move This time next week Houston will be a terrific memory filled with much success and many friends It is the birthplace of Gracie and will always hold a very special place in our hearts As fate would have it London is the next chapter From now until the end of the year Shanna can be reached via cell phone and her email will be Scotts cell in London direct dial We wish you all much love and peace S S G
